description: Homework only receives a pass/fail. To progress in class, every homework needs to be submitted. Without doing the homework, students cannot do their projects. Lecturers have an interest in ensuring that all assignments and tasks are completed. Students receive a total of 20% for the total grade for this part of the course.
This part of the project grades the technical parts of the final report.
items: YAML header has title, authors, table of contents that are correctly displayed in the derived output

description: This part of the project grades the technical parts of the final report.

description: This part of the project grades the technical parts of the final report.

description: This part of the project grades the intellectual framing of the results in the final report.

description: This part of the project grades the intellectual framing of the results in the final report.

description: This part of the project grades the intellectual framing of the results in the final report.
items: Conclusions concisely summarize findings; Recommendations for future work are provided
